Searched DeHashed for email@example.com, found 23 breach records spanning 2015-2024 including MyFitnessPal (150M breach, 2018), Canva (137M, 2019), Dubsmash (162M, 2019). Passwords revealed pattern of using family names + years (e.g., 'sarah2019', 'mike1995') indicating spouse and child names.

Queried OSINT Industries Eyecon API for email@domain.com, returned LinkedIn profile (john-doe-12345), Instagram (john_doe_official), phone number (+1-555-123-4567), and associated breach records from Collection #1 (2019 aggregated breach). Cross-referenced phone with Truecaller, confirmed name and profile photo match.

Ran Sherlock (https://github.com/sherlock-project/sherlock) on username 'john_tech_99', found accounts on 127 platforms including GitHub (active, 234 repos), Reddit (10K karma, tech subreddits), HackerNews (2015 member), Twitter/X, Instagram. GitHub README revealed full name, location (San Francisco), and email (john.doe@company.com). Reddit post history shows interest in cryptocurrency, Python, and mentions working at Google.

Used WhatsMyName (https://github.com/WebBreacher/WhatsMyName) to verify Sherlock results and find additional platforms. Discovered accounts on 15 additional platforms including dev.to, Medium (technical blog), Kaggle (data science profile), and StackOverflow (12K reputation). Medium blog posts revealed expertise in NLP and mentions previous employer (Facebook).
patterns.cross_reference_validation: Confirmed same person via profile photos and bio consistency

patterns.description: Searched Truecaller for +966-50-948-5127 (Saudi Arabia mobile), returned name 'ÙØ­ÙØ¯ Ø§ÙØ´ÙØ±Ù' (Mohammed Al-Shamri), profile photo, spam score (2/10, low), and tags (business). Also showed 3 associated names from different users who saved this contact. Truecaller indicated STC carrier, Riyadh region.

patterns.description: Queried OSINT Industries Eyecon for +966-50-948-5127, returned email shamri@example.com, LinkedIn profile (mohammed-alshamri-89012), and breach records showing phone appeared in Facebook 2019 leak (533M records) with name, email, and location data. Cross-referenced with LinkedIn, confirmed employment at Saudi Aramco.

Used Telegram API to check if +966-50-948-5127 is registered, returned Telegram username @mohammed_shamri and user ID 123456789. Telegram profile showed profile photo, last seen status, and bio mentioning 'Business inquiries'. No public groups or channels found.
patterns.notes: Telegram username can be searched separately for channel/group memberships

patterns.description: Analyzed 47 passwords from DeHashed breach records for john.doe@example.com. Found patterns: 15 passwords contained 'sarah' (likely spouse), 12 contained '1995' or '2019' (likely birth years of children), 8 used sequential patterns (Password123, Password124). Oldest password from 2012 LinkedIn breach was 'john1234', evolved to 'John@2019!' by 2019. Password strength improved over time but reuse remained high (same base password + year across 20+ services).

analysis_findings.intelligence_value: High - reveals family members (sarah), children's ages (1995, 2019)

patterns.description: Submitted 16 MD5 hashes from Canva breach (2019) to CrackStation (https://crackstation.net), successfully cracked 11 (69% success rate). Cracked passwords revealed: 'summer2019', 'design123', 'canva2019' suggesting user created simple passwords specific to service + year. Remaining 5 hashes were bcrypt (uncrackable without significant compute).
patterns.cost: Free for MD5/SHA1, paid ($20-100) for compute-intensive hashes
patterns.notes: Bcrypt hashes require GPU cracking (Hashcat) and may not be worth the compute cost

patterns.description: Located LinkedIn profile linkedin.com/in/john-doe-tech via Google search 'John Doe San Francisco Google'. Profile shows current position (Senior Engineer at Google, 2018-present), previous employers (Facebook 2015-2018, Microsoft 2012-2015), education (Stanford CS 2012), skills (Python, ML, NLP), and 500+ connections. Scraped using Firecrawl API, extracted 47 connections who are also Google employees (potential co-workers for HUMINT).
patterns.intelligence_value: High - co-workers identified for potential HUMINT, career timeline established

patterns.description: Found Instagram account @john_tech_99 via username enumeration, profile is public with 1,234 followers, 456 following, 89 posts. Bio: 'ML Engineer @Google | SF Bay Area | Tech enthusiast'. Posts show: travel photos (Japan, Europe), tech conference attendance (NeurIPS 2023, Google I/O 2024), family photos (wife + 2 kids), and dog. Geo-tags show San Francisco, Mountain View, and Menlo Park locations. Profile photo matches LinkedIn, confirming same person.
patterns.scraping_method: Manual browsing + Firecrawl for post extraction

patterns.description: Extracted domain 'example.com' from email john.doe@example.com, performed WHOIS lookup via WhoisXML API. Domain registered 2005, registrant 'Example Corp', registrant email admin@example.com, registrant location Delaware, US. Nameservers point to Cloudflare. Historical WHOIS shows domain was previously registered to 'John Doe' personally until 2010, then transferred to Example Corp (suggesting John founded the company).

whois_data.historical_whois: Originally registered to John Doe (2005-2010), then Example Corp

patterns.intelligence_value: High - suggests John Doe founded Example Corp in 2010

patterns.description: Found GitHub profile github.com/john_tech_99 via username enumeration, profile shows 234 repositories, 567 followers, 123 following. Top repositories: 'ml-toolkit' (2.3K stars, Python ML library), 'nlp-experiments' (internal Google code style), personal website repo revealing full name, email, and resume PDF. Contributions show activity on Google open-source projects (TensorFlow, JAX). README files mention affiliation with Google Brain team.
patterns.intelligence_value: Very High - resume PDF reveals full career history, email confirmed, team affiliation revealed
